channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S Stocks Rise, Treasurys Rally as Investors Cheer Bessent Pick
item.description: Stocks and bonds were rallying in the first trading session since Donald Trump picked longtime investor Scott Bessent to serve as Treasury Secretary.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s bitcoin buys lead to a new Wall Street-high stock price target
item.description: MicroStrategy buys more bitcoin, and Benchmark analyst’s new Street-high stock price target implies more than 60% upside.

item.title: Treasury bonds stage biggest rally in nearly 4 months after Bessent picked for Treasury
item.description: Longer-term Treasury yields dropped sharply Monday, sending prices higher on optimism that President-elect Donald Trump’s choice of Scott Bessent as T...

item.title: A stolen $97,000 disability check, a bureaucratic nightmare — and an unlikely happy ending
item.description: Todd Kahler was on the verge of homelessness after his Social Security disability-benefit check was stolen from the mail. He got the money back, but i...

item.title: Warren Buffett’s 5 estate-planning tips are just as valuable as his investing advice
item.description: If you think he’s smart about money, wait until you hear what he has to say about wills

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 3.4% lower, snapping a five-session winning streak, and silver fell 3.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: What's Flying Higher Than Bitcoin? The Software Company Buying Up Bitcoin
item.description: MicroStrategy shares are a more popular bitcoin play than the cryptocurrency itself for many individual investors.

item.title: Warren Buffett Donates Another $1 Billion. He Has Estate-Planning Advice for Everyone.
item.description: The legendary investor will again give a portion of his Berkshire Hathaway shares to four family foundations.

item.title: Euro Could Hit Parity Against Dollar in Mid-2025

item.title: Super Micro’s stock extends historic surge, has more than doubled in 7 days
